videoDetails.Title: How to guess distance in War Thunder – How to aim better in war Thunder realistic battles
videoDetails.Description:
Episode 8 is about how to aim better in War Thunder and gives you tips and tricks for tanks on how to guess distance in War Thunder ground forces realistic battles. I consider the new grid sell size and the stadiametric rangefinding to explain how to guess distance in war thunder. More tips on how to aim better in War Thunder will follow soon.

Support my channel:
Buy a Super Thanks (Thanks button in this video), which directly supports McKong gaming.

In case you missed episode 1 of how to aim better in War Thunder:

https://youtu.be/S6VV84lK8Mw

00:22 Grid cell size
01:06 Stadiametric rangefinding
04:59 SImplification
